## DeclarationKind type

The kinds of declarations we extract from module augmentation blocks

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DeclarationKind =
  | 'interface'
  | 'type'
  | 'function'
  | 'variable'
  | 'class'
  | 'enum'
  | 'namespace'
```
